   Press Releases 
     
                     
             2017 
                             
                                             
     Jul 20, 2017 
 
     Interim CEO Appointment 
 
     Saskatoon, SK (CNW–July 20, 2017) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. ("Karnalyte" or the "Company") (TSX: KRN) announced today that the Company's Board of Directors (the "Board") has appointed Mr. W. Todd Rowan as Interim Chief Executive Officer, effective July 20, 2017. Mr. Rowan will also continue to serve as a member of the Company's Board. The Board is currently undertaking a ...  Read More 
 
                                             
     Jul 4, 2017 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. – Executive Change 
 
     Saskatoon, SK (CNW–July 4, 2017) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. ("Karnalyte" or the "Company") (TSX: KRN) announced today that it has received and accepted the resignation of Mr. Siu Ma, as Executive Vice-president and Chief Operating Officer of the Company, effective as of July 30, 2017.  The Company will make an announcement on plans to replace Mr. Ma as soon as ...  Read More 
 
                                             
     Jun 29, 2017 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. – Executive Change 
 
     KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. Executive Change Saskatoon, SK (CNW–June 28, 2017) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. ("Karnalyte" or the "Company") (TSX: KRN) announced today that effective immediately, Mr. Robin Phinney, President, is no longer with the Company. The Company will make an announcement on plans to replace Mr. Phinney as soon as such information is available. For further information, please contact: Karnalyte ...
